common.preview: Fɔ si di tɛm bifo dis tɛm
common.completed: Wi tɛl una tɛnki fɔ we una dɔn di sɔv.
common.welcome: Di gol fɔ dis sɔv na fɔ no di impak we Sɔshial Inkam gɛt fɔ yu.

ratingChoices.extremelyUnlikely: I nɔ go izi fɔ du am
ratingChoices.unlikely: I nɔ go bi se i go bi

questions.employmentStatusTitle: Wetin na di wok we yu de du naw?

employmentStatusChoices.selfEmployed: Di wan dɛn we de wok fɔ dɛnsɛf
employmentStatusChoices.employedPartTime: Di wok: i de wok 1-39 awa insay di wik
employmentStatusChoices.employedFullTime: Di wok: i de wok fɔ 40 awa ɔ mɔ insay di wik
employmentStatusChoices.notEmployedLookingForWork: Nɔ wok: de luk fɔ wok
employmentStatusChoices.notEmployedNotLookingForWork: Nɔ de wok: NƆ de luk fɔ wok

questions.dependentsTitle: Yu gɛt ɛnibɔdi we de dipen pan yu?
questions.dependentsDesc: Nɔmba fɔ pipul dɛn we de dipen pan yu.
questions.basicNeedsCovergeTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ pe fɔ di tin dɛn we yu nid lɛk it, klos, ɛn say fɔ slip?
questions.expensesCoveredTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ pe ɔl yu spɛns dɛn di rayt tɛm?
questions.unexpectedExpensesCoveredTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ du sɔntin we yu nɔ bin de tink bɔt lɛk fɔ go to dɔktɔ?
questions.educationAccessTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ lan buk?
questions.savingsTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ kip mɔni?
questions.deptTitle: Yu ɔ ɛnibɔdi na yu os gɛt dɛt?
questions.plannedAchievementTitle: Wetin yu op fɔ ajɔst insay di nɛks 3 ia wit
questions.noHelpTitle: Yu ansa dis sɔv we ɔda pɔsin nɔ ɛp yu?
